sections.Biography:
===Background===
He is serving aboard the ''[[Fury]]'', [[Stannis Baratheon]]'s [[Ships|flagship]], fighting for [[House Baratheon of Dragonstone]] in the [[War of the Five Kings]].

===[[Season 2]]===
He is seen drilling men firing the ship's ballista as the fleet approaches [[King's Landing]].<ref>"[[The Prince of Winterfell]]"</ref>
